alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 3:55AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...PERIODS OF STRONG GUSTY WINDS POSSIBLE THIS AFTERNOON AND LATE TONIGHT... A strong cold front will move across the region and into the plains today. South winds this morning will shift into the west later today and especially tonight with brief gusts around 55 to 60 MPH possible through early Tuesday morning, especially between mile markers 240 and 280 along Interstate 80, and mile markers 70 and 75 along Interstate 25. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. Motorists are urged to use caution traveling across southeast Wyoming Monday afternoon and Monday night.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range
